ThingDef.label: whelingnorther saber
ThingDef.description: A thick, heavy and sharp military melee weapon, capable of cutting through armor, breaching fortifications, or cleaving a person in half.

ThingDef.label: "sunset" sniper rifle
ThingDef.description: A sniper rifle with advanced sights, capable of killing enemies at quite a distance. Its hollow-point bullets can deal a great amount of damage, one can hardly escape its attack. Even if the lucky few managed to survive, they will suffer from massive trauma and the almost inevitable infection.

ThingDef.label: "lead haze" assault rifle
ThingDef.description: A weapon suitable for short-range battle. This gun can dump a large amount of toxic bullets in a short period of time, very fine for street fighting. In countless past battles, WNA saboteurs have used this gun to dismantle countless steel-like solid fortresses from within.

ThingDef.label: spike trap launcher
ThingDef.description: A heavy individual artillery, not designed for directly blasting enemies, but for deploying traps. Its projectile does little harm to its targets, but deploys spike traps in an area. These spike traps are very dangerous.

ThingDef.label: spike trap deployed
ThingDef.description: Several blades half-burried underground with a set of specially designed trigger. If some careless person steps on it, the blades will teach this person an unforgettable lesson - sometimes a last lesson in their life. The heavier this trap is, the more deadly it is.

ThingDef.label: "sunset" sniper artillery mode
ThingDef.description: sunset sniper rifle switched to mortar mode, usually used with smaller-sized antigrain warheads. a single rail can lead shells through proper path, go a long distance and hit target.

ThingDef.label: "dawnbreaker" nuclear cannon
ThingDef.description: A individual mortar cannon powered by a vitalized uranium battery, equipped with a special warhead, not effective against buildings, but can release special infectious radiation field over a wide area.

ThingDef.label: kinetic coil
ThingDef.description: Since darknight commandos often perform various kinds of infiltration missions and often fall into a lack of arsenal supplies, weapons boosted by thought-kinetic techniques are widely used by them. This "kinetic coil" is capable of converting the most aggressive thoughts into destructive enegy pulses, as powerful as normal bullets and travels far more faster.

ThingDef.label: ionizing rifle
ThingDef.description: a beam rifle powered by an unstable-particle emitter, this rifle can generate powerful focused radiation beam to damage it's target, though weak against buildings, this weapon is unusually effective against living enemies.

ThingDef.label: lysis rifle
ThingDef.description: one of the most dreadful weapons invented by whelingnorther military. this weapon can shoot a beam of what called "lysis field", which can weaken the internal interaction of almost anything known, making them extremely fragile, and release a burst of lysis field when they finally break apart.

ThingDef.label: kinetic railgun
ThingDef.description: This weapon is heavy and slow, but is capable to launch an extremely destructive shell, vaporize a large area, as well as buildings and enemies in it. A unique technique is applied to this weapon, which can convert thoughts into energy to boost the power of this weapon. Currently only WNA is known to own such technique.

ThingDef.label: "howlstorm" artillary
ThingDef.description: Iron guardians carries the task of guarding vital outposts, and they do have proper weapons for their responsibility. The "howlstorm" individual artillary can perform very-long-range attacks, its shell can use a shockwave to stun its targets, and release several beacons around where it explodes. The beacons will connect to WNA's Chimingblaze Celestrike Satellite Network to summon a catastrophic orbital strike at where they are.

ThingDef.label: "howlstorm" HMG
ThingDef.description: Iron guardians carries the task of guarding vital outposts, and they do have proper weapons for their responsibility. The "howlstorm" HMG is one of the heaviest yet most awe-inspiring weapon in WNA conventional arsenal. It can cast a rain of thought-kinetic pulses over enemies with almost no breaks, and if someone is lucky enough to get close enough, then this weapon with astonishing size and weight will easily crush the lucky one into something just as mashed potato.

ThingDef.label: "howlstorm" MLRS
ThingDef.description: Iron guardians carries the task of guarding vital outposts, and they do have proper weapons for their responsibility. The "howlstorm" HMG is one of the heaviest yet most awe-inspiring weapon in WNA conventional arsenal. It can cast a rain of thought-kinetic pulses over enemies with almost no breaks, and if someone is lucky enough to get close enough, then this weapon with astonishing size and weight will easily crush the lucky one into something just as mashed potato.

ThingDef.label: whelingnorther rite sword
ThingDef.description: A longsword with unique shape, embued with otherworldly power. Such weapon is often used for ceremonial purposes, but it also has superior power as a weapon. Its flame is so violent that any wound it inflicts usually results in the immediate death of the victim.

ThingDef.label: whelingnorther rite lance
ThingDef.description: A lance with unique shape, embued with otherworldly power. Such weapon is often used for ceremonial purposes, but it also has superior power as a weapon. Its flame is so violent that any wound it inflicts usually results in the immediate death of the victim.
